mapper.select: /** selPrgmScheNextDay **/ select coalesce(yyyymmdd, '') as lately_day from bms_dd_mss_prgm_sche where yyyymmdd > #{yyyymmdd} order by yyyymmdd desc limit 1

/** selAdNprgmScheMergeForToDay **/ select h.yyyymmdd , '1'::text as sche_gubn , h.apln_form_id , h.ad_id , h.ad_nm , h.ad_length , h.ad_order , h.ch_id , h.ch_no , h.ch_nm , h.brdcst_dt , h.ori_start_dt , h.start_dt , h.end_dt , h.prgm_id , h.prgm_nm , h.prgm_start_dt , h.prgm_end_dt from ( select g.yyyymmdd , g.apln_form_id , g.ad_id , g.ad_nm , g.ad_length , g.ad_order , g.ch_id , g.ch_no , g.ch_nm , g.brdcst_dt , g.ori_start_dt , g.start_dt , g.end_dt , g.prgm_id , g.prgm_nm , g.prgm_start_dt , g.prgm_end_dt , g.cnt_over , row_number() over (partition by g.apln_form_id, g.ad_id, g.ch_id, g.ch_no order by g.start_dt, g.ad_order) as rnum from ( select f.yyyymmdd , f.apln_form_id , f.ad_id , f.ad_nm , f.ad_length , f.ad_order , f.ch_id , f.ch_no , f.ch_nm , f.brdcst_dt , f.ori_start_dt , f.start_ts , to_char(to_timestamp((extract(epoch FROM to_timestamp(f.prgm_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) - 900))::timestamp,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as start_dt , f.prgm_end_dt as end_dt , f.prgm_id , f.prgm_nm , f.prgm_start_dt , f.prgm_end_dt , count(*) over (partition by f.ch_id, f.ch_no, f.start_ts, f.ad_order) as cnt_over from ( select d.yyyymmdd , d.apln_form_id , d.ad_id , d.ad_nm , d.ad_length , d.ad_order , d.ch_id , d.ch_no , d.ch_nm , d.brdcst_dt , d.start_dt as ori_start_dt , (extract(epoch FROM to_timestamp(e.prgm_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) - 900) as start_ts , e.prgm_id , e.prgm_nm , e.prgm_start_dt , e.prgm_end_dt , row_number() over (partition by d.ch_id, d.ch_no, d.start_dt order by d.ad_order) as rnum from ( select c.yyyymmdd, c.ch_nm, c.brdcst_dt, c.hhmmss, c.ch_id, c.ch_no, c.apln_form_id, c.ad_id, c.ad_nm, c.ad_length, c.ad_order, c.start_dt, c.screen_gubn from ( select yyyymmdd, ch_nm, brdcst_dt, hhmmss, ch_id, otv_ch_no as ch_no, ad_order, ad_id, ad_nm, ad_length, apln_form_id , to_char(to_timestamp(substr(concat(yyyymmdd, lpad(hhmmss::text, 8, '0')),1,14), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as start_dt , 'OTV' as screen_gubn from bms_dd_ats_ad_sche where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} and otv_ch_no is not null and substr(lpad(hhmmss::text, 8, '0'),3,2) != '30' -- 30분 단위 광고 제외 -- and ad_length not in ('120') -- 120초 인포모셜 광고 제외, ad_type 넣어주기전 로직 and ad_type not in ('002') -- 120초 인포모셜 광고 제외 and otv_ch_no in ( select b.otv_ch_no from ( select a.otv_ch_no, a.sum_otv_view_cnt, row_number() over (order by a.sum_otv_view_cnt desc) as otv_rnum from ( select otv_ch_no, sum(cast(otv_view_cnt as bigint)) as sum_otv_view_cnt from ad_result where brdcst_dt between #{prev_from_yyyymmdd} and #{prev_to_yyyymmdd} and p_cmpl_yn = 'y' group by otv_ch_no ) a where a.otv_ch_no is not null or a.otv_ch_no != '' ) b where b.otv_rnum >= 1 and b.otv_rnum <= 30 ) union all select yyyymmdd, ch_nm, brdcst_dt, hhmmss, ch_id, concat('S', ots_ch_no) as ch_no, ad_order, ad_id, ad_nm, ad_length, apln_form_id , to_char(to_timestamp(substr(concat(yyyymmdd, lpad(hhmmss::text, 8, '0')),1,14), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as start_dt , 'OTS' as screen_gubn from bms_dd_ats_ad_sche where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} and ots_ch_no is not null and substr(lpad(hhmmss::text, 8, '0'),3,2) != '30' -- 30분 단위 광고 제외 -- and ad_length not in ('120') -- 120초 인포모셜 광고 제외, ad_type 넣어주기전 로직 and ad_type not in ('002') -- 120초 인포모셜 광고 제외 and ots_ch_no in ( select b.ots_ch_no from ( select a.ots_ch_no, a.sum_ots_view_cnt, row_number() over (order by a.sum_ots_view_cnt desc) as ots_rnum from ( select ots_ch_no, sum(cast(ots_view_cnt as bigint)) as sum_ots_view_cnt from ad_result where brdcst_dt between #{prev_from_yyyymmdd} and #{prev_to_yyyymmdd} and p_cmpl_yn = 'y' group by ots_ch_no ) a where a.ots_ch_no is not null or a.ots_ch_no != '' ) b where b.ots_rnum >= 1 and b.ots_rnum <= 30 ) ) c where not exists ( select 1 from bms_dd_amoeba_record_files dd where dd.apln_form_id = c.apln_form_id and dd.ad_id = c.ad_id and dd.ch_id = c.ch_id ) and ch_no not like 'S%' -- OTS 제외 ) d join ( select yyyymmdd, ch_no, prgm_id, prgm_nm, screen_gubn , prgm_start_dt , prgm_end_dt from bms_dd_mss_prgm_sche where yyyymmdd = #{yyyymmdd} ) e on d.ch_no = e.ch_no and e.prgm_start_dt <= d.start_dt and d.start_dt < e.prgm_end_dt ) f ) g where g.cnt_over = 1 -- 광고 + 프로그램 매핑 후 ad_order 가 2개이상 중복이 있으면 제거 ) h where h.rnum = 1 group by h.yyyymmdd , sche_gubn , h.apln_form_id , h.ad_id , h.ad_nm , h.ad_length , h.ad_order , h.ch_id , h.ch_no , h.ch_nm , h.brdcst_dt , h.ori_start_dt , h.start_dt , h.end_dt , h.prgm_id , h.prgm_nm , h.prgm_start_dt , h.prgm_end_dt order by h.start_dt, h.ch_no, h.ad_order
